title: [DOC-FIX] transition-request API not in REST API docs

labels.name: needs author feedback
labels.description: Issue is waiting for the author to respond

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

body:
### Willingness to contribute
The MLflow Community encourages documentation fix contributions. Would you or another member of your organization be willing to contribute a fix for this documentation issue to the MLflow code base?

- [ ] Yes. I can contribute a documentation fix independently.
- [ ] Yes. I would be willing to contribute a document fix with guidance from the MLflow community.
- [X] No. I cannot contribute a documentation fix at this time.

### URL(s) with the issue:

https://mlflow.org/docs/latest/rest-api.html

### Description of proposal (what needs changing):

I have found a number of references to the transition-requests API, but it is not listed in the REST API documentation. 
I have managed to figure out how to make it work for some simple use cases by testing and playing around with curl, but it would be nice to have this included in the documentation.
